name: Huli (Short Demo)
description:
This is a short demo of an action platformer.

Xbox Controller Control:

Move: Left Joystick

Jump: A

Attack: X

Dash: B

BattleArt(When energy is full): RT

Keyboard Control:

Move: AD

Jump: Space

Attack: J

Dash: L

BattleArt(When energy is full): I

Press R to restart

Press Esc to quit
